name: Mass Impact
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 38: A small world. Play as a small asteroid determined to take out the sun. Increase your size by smashing into smaller objects to eventually take out that pesky, ball of hot gas sitting there, glowing smugly at the center of the solar system thinking they are better than you. But beware larger objects will smash you into a million small pieces.

Controls:

W / Up / D / Right - Orbit closer to the sun

S / Down / A / Left - Orbit further from the sun

Space - Switch Orbit

Created by:

Mario Barone (https://twitter.com/mariodoesdesign): Design, Art, UI, Music

Dan Studdert (Twitter: https://twitter.com/danstuddert): Design, Code, S-FX

Tools Used:

Unity
BFXR
Maya-LT
Photoshop
Linux MultiMedia Studio
